m_szDocSumamry: Air Pollution From Cars Harms Babies September 23rd, 2014 by Stephen Grinwis   I’ll be honest. I found this surprising, even for someone pretty heavily biased towards electric vehicles. However, a study out of Princeton and Columbia did a pretty robust analysis and this is their conclusion. They took advantage of the introduction of E-ZPass to compare and contrast groups of pregnant women within close range to toll plazas.
